auth.signUpPrompt: Please enter your details to sign up.
auth.noAccount: Don't have an account? Sign up
auth.haveAccount: Already have an account? Log in

errors.email: Please enter a valid email address
errors.passwordMin: Password must be at least 8 characters long
errors.passwordComplexity: Please use at least one uppercase, one lowercase letter and one number

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.desc: Sorry, the page you are looking for does not exist.

home.tagline: Track, manage and grow your real estate business.
home.createPropertyDesc: Add a new property including units
home.createTenantDesc: Add a new tenant to a unit

tenants.desc: The table below shows all your tenants. To view a tenant's profile page, click on their profile picture.

table.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this tenant? This action cannot be undone.

rentals.title: Rental Units
rentals.desc: These are your rental properties, so the units of each property are displayed here. You can filter the units by property using the dropdown above.

properties.title: Properties
properties.desc: These are your properties, for more information such as the units of each property, click on the property.

maintenance.title: Maintenance
maintenance.desc: This is where you can view and add maintenance reports.
maintenance.reportDescription: Use this form to create a new maintenance report.

financials.title: Financials
financials.desc: This page offers an overview of the financials for either a single property or all properties, depending on your selection.
financials.rentScheduleSubtitle: This table shows all expected lease payments and keeps track of their payment status.

table.deleteLeaseConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this lease? This action cannot be undone.
table.deleteLeasesConfirm: You are about to delete {{count}} lease(s). Are you sure?

messages.title: Messages
messages.imageUrlDesc: Enter the URL of the image you want to send

alert.title: Tenant Not Assigned To Unit
alert.desc: This tenant has not been assigned to a unit and some features may not be available. If you wish to assign this tenant to a unit, you can do so on the rental unit page.

invite.desc: This tenant has not created an account yet.

propertyDetail.dbTableIntro: The table below shows the data of the property from the database.

rentalDetail.intro: View and manage details of this rental unit
rentalDetail.leasesSubtitle: This is the lease history for unit {{unit}}
rentalDetail.maintenanceSubtitle: This is the maintenance history for this unit.
rentalDetail.expensesSubtitle: These are the expenses connected to this unit.

bulk.title: Bulk Property Creation
bulk.subtitle: You can add multiple properties at once by uploading a CSV file in the specified format.

step1.title: Download CSV Template
step1.desc: Download the CSV template and fill out the data for each property.

step2.title: Upload CSV File
step2.desc: Upload the filled CSV file to create properties in bulk.

step3.title: Review & Confirm
step3.desc: Review the generated units & properties and confirm the creation.

expenses.addExpenseDesc: Add a new expense to the system
